formattedAddress: 2771 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10039, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2771 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10039, USA

originalText.text: I love it here! The staff here is fantastic!!! They always make me feel welcomed and go the extra mile. From the moment you walk in with security they always greet with a smile, the receptionist at the front desk are always nice and courteous. The nurses are top tier and my Doctors are wonderful! Tbh I want to say I'm still alive because they make me care I want to do better for myself and they have a huge impact because of that I can't thank them enough. I just want to to give a shout out to Rubi and Dr Santillan there's definitely more people I would like to shout-out by name but I lost the paper with your names I'm so sorry but you guys are fantastic!!!

originalText.text: Just left this clinic , Joey and the staff is the best. Quality care rendered, all issues addressed and I feel like my care matters. Plus I love the diversity and the communication level from the front to the back! Look forward to going back.

text.text: Just left this clinic , Joey and the staff is the best. Quality care rendered, all issues addressed and I feel like my care matters. Plus I love the diversity and the communication level from the front to the back! Look forward to going back.

originalText.text:
The staff there are very nice and friendly every time I go. My doctor is Dr.Theresa Mack she is hands down AMAZING! She always writes me back in timely manner, calls me anytime I have health concerns, she checked up on me when I had covid and always supportive, patient and actually listens. She genuinely cares about her patients, I am beyond grateful to have a doctor who I trust when it comes to all my health and well being. I truly believe that if anyone ever says anything bad about her then they are the difficult patient because she is hands down the best, highly recommended her if you are looking for a #GREAT doctor.

Thank you soooooooooo much Dr.Mack for just being you ! you are appreciated !

originalText.text: Really I'm professional I booked an appointment a month in advance and they waited till the day of my appointment to call me and tell me that they did not accept my insurance then turned around and cancelled my appointment. I used to go there before and that was never the case. why wait till the day of my appointment to tell me you don't take my insurance. You guy's had a whole month you could have called me before my appointment you guys had one job. SMH.

originalText.text: The best place to receive excellent care from genuine staff.
